Posts.Content: Hi Red I just had a lumpectomy on Monday and it was rather hellish but live-able ..and mine was very deep behind my nipple next to my ribcage(I say very deep because my breast are DDD`s ), but I`m feeeling much better already! And for my peice of mind it was worth it....I find out on tuesday wheather it is cancer or not.
Posts.Title: lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Go to you're doctor now ...as the above poster said black and red discharge can be a bad sign....I've got black...and yes it's scary......i'm going for a utlra sound and mamagram in a week and a half (it was suposed to be this week but beacuse it's BC awarness month there very booked up ....how scewy is that ). Do you have any lumps that you can feel..you're doctor will do a breast exam and see if you do ...And is the discharge in on or two breast ...it's better to have it in both ...can you tell i've spent the last 5 days researching this ? Good luck and please c all he doctor now!!
Posts.Title: Nipple Discharge

Posts.Content: Clear discharge is generally not something to worry about too much..so says my doctor ...but dark green , grey or black is not good. I've had clear discharge for many years (15+)and have just started having black (which is old blood).......it's not fun but they said that I don't have cancer ..so I'm happy..good luck.
Posts.Title: Nipple discharge/sore

Posts.Content: That's good that you're getting in to the surgeon so qucikly ..the waiting is hellish ..........I hope the news is good ..let us all know.
Posts.Title: Nipple Discharge

Posts.Content: Thanks you shiss , my appointment is on monday ........
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: The appointment went well, the surgeon was there and looked over my ultra sound and mammogram immmediatly and cleared me right away..........thank you for all the support.......
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: Thanks Sera..........good to knowBut from everthing i've read (on line)...that fact that the discharge is only on one side is a bad sign.

Posts.Content: Not to be rude but compared to the other boards ...you`re all very quiet!!!
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: Honestly I usually I'm very positive ..but in the last year I have #1 found out my husband of many years cheated on my with a close friend#2 lost 4 close friends(all dies from different things #3 just put my dog to sleep #4 almost died from several sever asthma attacks and #5 now this ............I really just don't have any fight left in me and can't belive all this crap could happen to one person in less than 8 months
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: Hi , I'm 38 and have a family history of BC....my grandmother and great grandmother ....both had masectomys(but survived).Now this week I noticed black liquid leaking from my one nipple ...so I went to the doctor and she found that breast (the leaking one) has way more lumps that my right one...alomst double and close to my ribs rather than nipple. She's sending me for a ultra sound and mamagram this week ..... THAt worries me ..this is Onatrio I live in it usually takes months to get a test done. Everything I read about black discharge lead me to belive that it was probably just a benige fibroid cyst ....excuse my spelling it sucks when I'm upset...Sshould I be worried ????
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: Thank you Shiss ...I have my appointment for a mammogram , ultra sound in a week and a half ...that was the first avalible "emergency " appointment they since it's BC Awarness month ...It's been a rough week i had to put down my dog who was only 5 yrs old ......he had a mass of cancer in his chest pressing against his lungs........he was the sweetest dog every ..honestly I'm devistated, it just seems like one thing after another ........and I don't think I have anything left in me to fight if it is cancer I have (i just got over a severe asthma flare up and phnemeonia for 2 weeks).....
Posts.Title: More lumps in breast with black discharge ..

Posts.Content: You're probably not going to wan tto hear this but black liquid is generally from old blood, I just finished having an ultra sound and mamogram done becasue I was leaking black liquid out of my breast (just one side though). But happily they were both negative and my surgen belives it's probaly not cancer. Get to your doctor ASAP...this isn't a noram breast thing and you really have to get it checked out ...good luck!!
Posts.Title: Breast Leak Black Liquid
